xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.5 Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.5.1 Kusalapada » 2.5.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Naadhipati
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Naadhipati
73.
1409Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
74.
1410Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1411Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1412Adhipatipaccayā hetuyā nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1413(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
<< Hetuup2.5.1.7 Pañhāvāra >>
